name: R is for Rachel
description:
Joan goes through tough times at school. She has a hard time integrating herself with her classmates. It doesn’t feel like she belongs there.
When she falls for Rachel, everything changes. But Rachel’s hiding a deadly secret that will change Joan’s life forever.

What to expect?


  • A story about a character that suffers from social anxiety disorder, while getting bullied at school.
  • Retro 80’s soundtrack by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio.
  • A typing system to move forward with the story.

R is for Rachel feels like reading a novel. It's a single-ending experience with some choices that will help the main character uncover the truth and achieve her goal.

For fans of text-based story driven games.
